body.p: The display of all recordings and all details of a record in always listed the same way in GLPI. Whether it's a list of computers, telephones or tickets, the presentation follows the same principle.
A list of items can be obtained in two ways: from the search engine or from another list.

From the search engine, after determining the criteria and validated research, a list of records is displayed. By default no search criteria does not limit the list of records available and the display is first n limited to the list.

example.p: From the menu Assets Computers : If any search criterion is determined, the first n computers of the list will be posted.

body.p: From a list, a new list can be obtained.

example.p: From a computer list: click on the name of a computer; navigate tab software. The list of software installed on this computer is displayed.

body.p: Record details that are of similar information are grouped by and displayed in tabs.

example.p: To a computer, financial information and a list of software is in two tabs distinct.

section.title: Customize the display
section.p: The columns displayed from the inventory list are configurable. Click the in the pager.

You can add, delete and sort the columns displayed. The overall view applies to all profiles having access to the inventory: modification thereof will be visible to all users. View only applies to personal users connected, and can override the settings of the global view.
